Note: These pressure ratings are the same value as the design
pressure of the corresponding pipe size and schedule in the same class
location, as determined by the formula given in section
255.121
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.191

These pressure ratings are the same value as the design
pressure of the corresponding pipe size and schedule in the same class
location, as determined by the formula given in section
255.121
of this Part and the
limitations of section
255.123. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
